Questions.Text: Which technology is commonly used for secure payment processing in e-commerce platforms?
Questions.Explanation: Braintree is a popular payment processing platform used in e-commerce to handle transactions securely. It provides tools to manage payments, subscriptions, and fraud prevention, which are crucial for online businesses.

Questions.Text: What is the purpose of the Entity Framework Core (EF Core) in an ASP.NET Core application?
Options: A) To manage user authentication and authorization.
B) To handle data manipulation and querying in a database.
C) To design the front-end user interface.
D) To secure communication between servers.
Questions.Explanation: Entity Framework Core (EF Core) is an Object-Relational Mapper (ORM) for ASP.NET Core. It allows developers to interact with a database using .NET objects, simplifying data manipulation and querying tasks within an application.

Questions.Text: What is A/B testing, and how is it used in e-commerce?
Options: A) Testing two different products to see which one sells more.
B) Comparing two versions of a webpage to determine which one performs better based on user interactions.
C) Testing two different server configurations for performance.
D) Running two different marketing campaigns simultaneously.
Questions.Explanation: A/B testing is a method used in e-commerce to compare two versions of a webpage or app against each other to determine which one performs better. It helps businesses make data-driven decisions by analyzing user interactions.

Questions.Text: Which of the following best describes MailKit and MimeKit?
Options: A) Libraries used for handling file uploads in an application.
B) Libraries used for handling email functionalities, including sending newsletters and notifications.
C) Libraries used for managing user sessions.
D) Libraries used for database management.
Questions.Explanation: MailKit and MimeKit are .NET libraries used for handling email functionalities. MailKit is used for sending, receiving, and processing emails, while MimeKit is used for parsing and creating MIME messages.
